The claim is contradicted by Biden: s previous statements, including in the first presidential debate, where he stated that he would "listen to the scientists" in deciding whether to close or reopen the economy.
The Biden campaign swiftly responded to: stating that it is completely fabricated.
Biden: s statement in August, during an interview with ABC News, where he expressed willingness to shut down the country again if scientists advised it to control the virus.
